hero_power.description: Passive. Start the game with a 2/1 Shredder that summons a minion from your hand and gives it Divine Shield.

warband.name: Sneed's New Shredder
warband.description: Deathrattle: Summon the highest-Health minion from your hand and give it Divine     Shield for this combat.

warband.name: Manasaber
warband.description: Deathrattle: Summon two 0/1 Cublings with Taunt.

tavern_entities.name: Sun-Bacon Relaxer
tavern_entities.description: When you sell this, get 2 Blood Gems.

tavern_entities.name: Tusked Camper
tavern_entities.description: Rally: Play a Blood Gem on this.
